---
title: "CrumpRTemplates"
---

Learning how to make R markdown templates...Use at your own risk :)

Templates listed here (as I build them) can be installed from the following github repository [https://github.com/CrumpLab/CrumpRTemplates](https://github.com/CrumpLab/CrumpRTemplates)

note: this requires that the `devtools` library is installed.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("CrumpLab/CrumpRTemplates")
```
